body.p: MYRICK A. CHAPMAN We are indebted to Wm. Seymour, of Minneapolis for the following clip- ping regarding a former resident. Mr. Chapman was a son of Leander H. Chapman, of Pleasant View, and was well known here. Rites for Myrick A. Chapman, 56, 905 Fourteenth avenue S., will be at 2 p. m. Tuesday at Gill Brothers? Mortuary. Burial in Crystal Lake cemetery. Born in Jackson county, Wisconsin, he had lived in Minneapolis 35 years. Surviving are three sisters, Marie of Chicago; Mrs. Francis Kilpatrick, of Pittsburg, Kan.; and Mrs. C. M. Hill, of Minneapolis.
